short_summary: Annual Inspection and Servicing of Trailers
description: The Canadian Coast Guard, Marine Engineering, Burlington, ON requires a standing offer on and as and when required basis for the annual inspection and servicing of approximately seventy-five (75) trailers as per RFSO.
tags: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
full_summary:
**Tender for Annual Inspection and Servicing of Trailers**

**Tender Reference:** WS4091685739 - 4091835317
**Publication Date:** 8/15/2023
**Closing Date:** 9/25/2023 (14:00:00)
 
**Description:**
The Canadian Coast Guard requires a standing offer for the annual inspection and servicing of approximately 75 trailers, as and when required.

**Procedure:**

* Request for Standing Offer (RFSO): WS4091685739
* Tender Type: Competitive – open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Applies to Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Regions of Delivery: Canada
 
**Eligibility:**
The tender is open to suppliers who are in good standing with the government and have the necessary qualifications and expertise to perform the work described in the tender document.

**Contact Information:**

* Stephanie Way, Contracting Authority
* Phone: Not provided
* Email: [stephanie.way@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stephanie.way@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice:** The tender notice, including the RFSO and all relevant documents, can be found at [Ariba Discovery] (http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17167486?extsite=MTcxNjc0ODZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

**Attachments:** Not Provided. Please refer to the notice for all relevant information. 


Notice: Tender was previously revised with a new tender number. Tax preferences were removed. Please keep in mind to only use already available work relevant to this project only. Modifications to unspsc description are done in our possible isnspc additions/columns. Forecasted duration of the tender is given at the moment of request. The request is apart of our "Living Lab" project. For more information you can find your region below. [ Portugal Ireland Australia New Zealand United Arab Emirates South Korea Hong Kong Japan etc...] all dev countries we are embarking on foreign adaptations and endeavors
